name: Mission Objective
info: As biologists, our objective is to safely land on Xotera and collect research on whether Xotera is capable of hosting life

name: Pre-mission Introductions
info: Letâ€™s take a moment to introduce ourselves and share a specimen we have been studying in our personal practices

name: The Spacecraft
info: Input your spacecraft into our AI servers by roughly sketching your spacecraft in the Spacecraft Detector at the bottom of the page

name: Spacecraft Sketches and it's Capabilities
info: Sketch your spacecraft in your designated at the bottom of the page. In the intercom, inform the team of it's capabilities

name: Spacecraft Feedback
info: In the intercom, provide feedback on your team's spacecraft selection. What do you think of the team's spacecraft?

name: Interplanetary Travel
info: Get ready for take-off. Everyone, please launch your control centers through the link at the top of the screen.

name: Planet Utu
info: Search Planet Utu for a life form. Once you find something, record your notes in the Life Observations Box below
